icon.description: Icon name, optionally see wd-icon component
icon.description_zh: 图标名称，可选值见 wd-icon 组件

is-dot.description: Whether to display a small red dot in the upper right corner of the icon
is-dot.description_zh: 是否显示图标右上角小红点

type.description: The type of badge displayed in the upper-right corner of the icon
type.description_zh: 图标右上角显示的 badge 类型

value.description: The badge icon in the upper right corner shows the value
value.description_zh: 图标右上角 badge 显示值

max.description: The badge maximum value in the upper right corner of the icon, if the maximum value is exceeded, '{max}+' will be displayed, and the value is required to be of type Number
max.description_zh: 图标右上角 badge 最大值，超过最大值会显示 '{max}+'，要求 value 是 Number 类型

url.description: The link address that you will be directed to after clicking
url.description_zh: 点击后跳转的链接地址

link-type.description: For the page redirection method, please refer to the WeChat Mini Program routing document
link-type.description_zh: 页面跳转方式, 参考微信小程序路由文档

use-slot.description: Whether or not to turn on the GridItem content slot
use-slot.description_zh: 是否开启 GridItem 内容插槽

use-icon-slot.description: Whether the GridItem icon slot is turned on
use-icon-slot.description_zh: 是否开启 GridItem icon 插槽

use-text-slot.description: 是否开启 GridItem text 内容插槽
use-text-slot.description_zh: 是否开启 GridItem text 内容插槽

badge-props.description: Customize the properties of the logo, and the incoming object will be transparently passed to the props of the Badge component
badge-props.description_zh: 自定义徽标的属性，传入的对象会被透传给 Badge 组件的 props

slots.name: default
slots.description: By default, the contents of each grid are displayed
slots.description_zh: 宫格中每一格的默认显示全部内容

slots.name: icon
slots.description: The content of the icon in the grid
